title: Indian Summers: Episode 3 Scene Masterpiece
text: Alice begins to see her brother in a new light, in this scene from Indian Summers, Episode 3, airing Sunday, October 11, 2015 at 9/8c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #IndianSummersPBS
